content: fl keeping the tendril on the hook take both remaining ends of the tendril and yarn over the hook pulling them through the folded tendril this creates a snug hold see figure 9-12 figure 9 figure 10 eyes - make 2 with yarn in eye colour 1 sc4 in magic_ring 4 2 increase around 8 3 single_crochet around 8 4 single_crochet around fo leaving long tail for sewing closed 8 stitch hole closed after inserting 6mm safety eye in center of magic_ring - i don t stuff but that is your call sew or glue onto sides of head see figure 13 figure 11 figure 12 note you can also use pompoms with a googly eye glued on or an alternate eye combination of your choice i have used googly eyes on the crocheted white as well figure 13 you re done great work yep yep
